output_list.criticism: The allowance function allows attackers to conduct a Wrong Logic Attack, where an attacker can set any user's allowance to any value.
The transfer function does not check the return value of the transferFrom function, which can lead to loss of funds.
The transferFrom function does not check the return value of the approve function, which can lead to loss of funds.
The approve function does not check the return value of the transferFrom function, which can lead to loss of funds.
The approveAndCall function does not check the return value of the approve function, which can lead to loss of funds.
The transferEth function does not check the return value of the transfer function, which can lead to loss of funds.
